textBox.richText: After presents, Gunter and I headed over to do some “lighter” skiing. Did a bunch of the easier trees, and *had* to do some bumps. My favorite part of the day: cruising over at pioneer. Gunter was working on Tele drills, so we tried a “2-lap/3-lap” interleaving. I tried to “gain” as many chairs as I could...typically for those speed runs, it was around 30+ chairs. Looking at Phresheez, my speeds were in the 35-40 mph range. Note in the vid below, this is “real time”...no speeding up. Fun!
